definitions.definition: A pair of straps , with stirrups , joined at the top and fastened to the pommel or the frame of the saddle , after they have been adjusted to the convenience of the rider.
A kind of chain pump , or dredging machine.

main_definition: A pair of straps , with stirrups , joined at the top and fastened to the pommel or the frame of the saddle , after they have been adjusted to the convenience of the rider.
secondary_definitions: A kind of chain pump , or dredging machine.
